body:
spack version v0.8.17-8602-g51bd319
centos 7
gcc 6.4.0

command:
```
$ spack install dyninst
```

error:
```
  >> 596     make[2]: *** No rule to make target `libiberty/libiberty.a', needed by `common/libcommon.so.9.3.2'.  Stop.
```

output: https://gist.github.com/gijzelaerr/85483572a5957e0ed38b536ed19837be

compile log: https://gist.github.com/gijzelaerr/dd67c2422b7935ffc1a6208abe33683d
title: dyninst 9.3.2 fails on centos 7 with gcc 6.4.0
